<p class="russiannovelnarrow">I am a PhD Student in the Department for [Experimental Psychology](http://www.ipsy.ovgu.de/en/exppsy.html) at [Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg](https://www.uni-magdeburg.de/en/). I am interested in studying how cognitive phenomena of visual perception might be represented and integrated in the human brain. To that end, I analyze functional neuroimaging data.</p>
